Nemesis Enforcer/Ramhorn/Kluster:



Nemesis Enforcer looked to Delta.  "Uh huh...that was interesting." he said 
in an unsure tone, refering to Zardus' disappearance.

<Panzertron, this is Nemesis Enforcer.  Unless you want to talk to flunkies, 
we will not be going to your ship.  Zardus has disappeared.  He'll be back 
soon though>

"Follow me." Nemesis told Delta, heading back for the Alliance base.

===

Ramhorn heard Archangle's transmission.  He sighed.  "What a total retard!"

---

Kluster recieved Archangle's com transmission.  Kluster sighed, immediately 
activating his com unit in his left wrist.  

<This is Kluster, to all Maximals.  I am currently in charge of the 
Cybertronian Fire,  the Maximal craft that crashed onto the planet.  I urge 
you not to follow this idiot Archangle.  Iron Riptor...or whatever, was 
captured?  Well, did you ever stop to think the plot of the people who 
captured him is to wait until you make a rescue party, attack, and they will 
attack back?  Or with allies?>

Kluster sighed over the com.

<From what I understand, the Ark is in total shambles because you guys can't 
get your acts together.  We should wait until the Ark and Cybertronian Fire 
are repaired and have strong defenses before we go and attack anyone.  I may 
not be in charge of the Maximals, but that is merely my opinion.  Rushing off 
to get killed isn't my idea of a compitent mission>
